page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF _
page.content: Stuart Armour first became an employee of Tescos when he was sixteen years old. During the next year he worked himself up through the following jobs_ trainee assistant,deputy store manager and then General manager. Even thogh he went to University he worked himself up from a part time worker to the highest position you get in a shop of this size in Cumbria. His job consists of taking charge of the whole shop. Stuart said,"The job is as difficult as you make it". He enjoys his work very much and has been manager at Tescos for four weeks now. His daily routine is to first inspect the store.Department supervisors see if it is clean,presentable and make sure that the staff are available for the customers. He consults with the department manager regularly.
